overview: Senior ministry official Ludvik and his wife Anna come back from an official party only to find their home has been broken into and is riddled with listening devices. A harrowing night follows as the couple becomes more and more paranoid that they’re being targeted by the government.
cast: Radoslav Brzobohatý|Jiřina Bohdalová|Jiří Císler|Miloslav Holub|Milica Kolofíková
